pageSetting.title: 贵金属业绩分配日志

select.isEqual: SELECT F_TIMETOCHAR(GXRZ.JLSJ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') JLSJ, czy.hymc as xgry, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz , case when gxrz.czlx='01' then '新增'when gxrz.czlx='02' then '修改' else '删除' end as czlx, jxdx.khh, jxdx.khmc, jxdx.gjsbh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, gxjl.QSRQ, gxjl.jsrq, '分配比例:' || F_NumToChar(gxjl.zlbl) as fpgx, jg1.jgmc as qyjg, jxdx.qyrq from xtb_hygxrz_gjs gxrz inner join xtb_hygxjl_gjs gxjl on gxrz.jldh=gxjl.jldh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gxjl.KHDXDH inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ INNER JOIN JXDX_gjsqy JXDX ON JXDX.gjsbh=GXRZ.gjsbh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.JGDH=jxdx.JGDH where 1=1 and gxrz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and gxrz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND JXDX.gjsbh LIKE '%$gjsbh$%' order by gxrz.jlsj desc,jxdx.KHH,jxdx.gjsbh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc

SELECT F_TIMETOCHAR(GXRZ.JLSJ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') JLSJ, czy.hymc as xgry, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz , case when gxrz.czlx='01' then '新增'when gxrz.czlx='02' then '修改' else '删除' end as czlx, jxdx.khh, jxdx.khmc, jxdx.gjsbh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, gxjl.QSRQ, gxjl.jsrq, '分配比例:' || F_NumToChar(gxjl.zlbl) as fpgx, jg1.jgmc as qyjg, jxdx.qyrq from xtb_hygxrz_gjs gxrz inner join xtb_hygxjl_gjs gxjl on gxrz.jldh=gxjl.jldh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gxjl.KHDXDH inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ INNER JOIN JXDX_gjsqy JXDX ON JXDX.gjsbh=GXRZ.gjsbh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.JGDH=jxdx.JGDH where 1=1 and gxjl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and gxrz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND JXDX.gjsbh LIKE '%$gjsbh$%' order by gxrz.jlsj desc,jxdx.KHH,jxdx.gjsbh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT F_TIMETOCHAR(GXRZ.JLSJ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') JLSJ, czy.hymc as xgry, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz , case when gxrz.czlx='01' then '新增'when gxrz.czlx='02' then '修改' else '删除' end as czlx, jxdx.khh, jxdx.khmc, jxdx.gjsbh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, gxjl.QSRQ, gxjl.jsrq, '分配比例:' || F_NumToChar(gxjl.zlbl) as fpgx, jg1.jgmc as qyjg, jxdx.qyrq from xtb_hygxrz_gjs gxrz inner join xtb_hygxjl_gjs gxjl on gxrz.jldh=gxjl.jldh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gxjl.KHDXDH inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ INNER JOIN JXDX_gjsqy JXDX ON JXDX.gjsbh=GXRZ.gjsbh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.JGDH=jxdx.JGDH where 1=1 and gxrz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and gxrz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND JXDX.gjsbh LIKE '%$gjsbh$%' order by gxrz.jlsj desc,jxdx.KHH,jxdx.gjsbh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc
SELECT F_TIMETOCHAR(GXRZ.JLSJ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') JLSJ, czy.hymc as xgry, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz , case when gxrz.czlx='01' then '新增'when gxrz.czlx='02' then '修改' else '删除' end as czlx, jxdx.khh, jxdx.khmc, jxdx.gjsbh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, gxjl.QSRQ, gxjl.jsrq, '分配比例:' || F_NumToChar(gxjl.zlbl) as fpgx, jg1.jgmc as qyjg, jxdx.qyrq from xtb_hygxrz_gjs gxrz inner join xtb_hygxjl_gjs gxjl on gxrz.jldh=gxjl.jldh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gxjl.KHDXDH inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ INNER JOIN JXDX_gjsqy JXDX ON JXDX.gjsbh=GXRZ.gjsbh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.JGDH=jxdx.JGDH where 1=1 and gxjl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and gxrz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND JXDX.gjsbh LIKE '%$gjsbh$%' order by gxrz.jlsj desc,jxdx.KHH,jxdx.gjsbh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc ) t
